title: Hit
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Harry Korshak and Sidney J. Furie
brief_description: A special ‘hit’ team, consisting of 7 individuals are recruited for a death defying mission of revenge. Each has their own motivation for blood lust. They are led by a vigilante federal agent Nick Allen, played by Billy Dee Williams, who is motivated by seeking revenge against drug dealers for the death of his daughter. The location is Marseilles as they close in on the drug syndicate. Also starring Richard Pryor, Paul Hampton and Gwen Welles.
